website_summaries.verdict: With its impressive body tracking and unique, controller-free experience, Kinect is great for casual gaming parties and workouts--assuming you have enough room to play it.
pros: games will have you very active
cons: menu and video navigation is occasionally wonky and gets old fast
requires a lot of room to play
hard-core gamers may not feel satisfied
requires separate power supply when used with older Xbox 360 consoles

customer_reviews.title: Ahead of its Time!
customer_reviews.text: Kinect is a step up from the 1st Nintendo WII. It uses thermal imaging to track your movement without the need of a controller. It will require periodic calibration and a large room. Some games work better than others. Overall this is an awesome piece of technology and a lot of fun for the family!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Grammo

customer_reviews.title: bad product. DOA
customer_reviews.text: This product came dead it never works. I tried to see if I could make it work. I never did. I keep the product. however, I wasted my money. I was a while ago, but I still feel that this seller take advantage of me. I called him he told me I have to send it back and I have to pay for shipping. I will not buy from this seller any more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy kids = happy dad
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE their Kinect. On the rainy Oregon days, they can still stay active playing soccer, dancing or skating while stuck inside the house. I got this from Amazon Warehouse Deals, so I saved a few bucks on it, but it included everything except the original box. It looked brand new, too, so definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tedomatic

customer_reviews.title: Nice add-on for the Xbox 360 or Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Sad to hear that Microsoft is discontinuing this little add-on. It's easily one of the best gaming investments we've made. The kids love coming over to play video games, and we love that they are active in everything they're doing in front of the TV. I know that VR will open things up, but this is free play at its free-est.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer Dad

customer_reviews.title: they seem to work good
customer_reviews.text: bought these cause i needed 2 and they both seem to work good (just for clarification) i guess i misread title? thought would get a game with each sensor but i am still happy with purchase and price.
customer_reviews.author: William R.

customer_reviews.title: Kinect
customer_reviews.text: This Kinect system is great.Did not think an old guy like me would enjoy it.It wears me out.Great excersize and great FUN........I could imagine having many people at one time playing this.What a sight. It is fabulous. Kids will have a blast and us older kids love it as well. Wish I had bought this earlier. Add on to my review...Now I am 50+..and to run and jump and dodge and move side to side...is great blood circulation. Most can not keep the activity up , but that is OK, it is still very fun...and if I can do it with my health issue...ANYONE Can.....kids will love it...older folks will get a blast......I know I do.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: but i had a great deal of trouble getting the Kinect to see all ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's the Kinect Sensor itself, or if it's the games I've purchased for it, but i had a great deal of trouble getting the Kinect to see all the children (2, 3 or 4, depending on what the game allows for) in front of it. Doesn't matter if i reposition the sensor, close the blinds, move the kids, etc. There's almost always an issue. Sometimes everything works smoothly, but most times one kid ends up being grayed out and not being picked up by the sensor. I've tried this with 4 or 5 different "dance" games i've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: FoxyRoxy

customer_reviews.title: Just be careful ordering used products
customer_reviews.text: I purchased from a third-party not knowing the package was delivered in a paper bag and was very filthy and disgusting 😷 worth of 54 dollars that i spent
customer_reviews.author: Meeno Love

customer_reviews.title: Fun that just doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Now that i've had this product for awhile, I realize what it is. A big gimmick. Now don't get me wrong, when I first used it to play Kinect Adventures and a few other titles, it was fun. However, it didn't last long. Most games don't control very well. The main exception is the Dance Central series. Beyond that, there's not much to play. As far as controlling the XBOX dashboard, you would be better served to use a controller. The hand motions are slow and half the time you have to recalibrate your sensor if you move or stand up/sit down. If you can find one for 50 bucks or less, its a nice distraction, but not much more.
customer_reviews.author: MrStripes84

customer_reviews.title: ... could play just dance 2016 and we are so happy we bought this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 yr old daughter so she could play just dance 2016 and we are so happy we bought this. Well worth it. My daughter hasn't figured out the game controlers yet, but I wanted her to be able to play some kind of video game. Bonus is this is for games that make you get up and move. But you don't have to hold any kind of controler.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Xbox 360 Kinect
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Its fun to play with it and once connected to the Xbox you can use the Kinect to move around your Xbox dashboard or do voice commands too!
customer_reviews.author: Dragon

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. Looks like new. I used it to build a SLS/Kinect sensor for ghost hunting. Picks up the stick figures of spirits. Maps them in when clearly there is no one standing there. Works for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: We love this sensor
customer_reviews.text: We love this sensor! Playing sports with this sensor makes every game lots of fun and so realistIc. It automatically adjust to seeing your image when set up properly, which by the way is pretty easy as I did this myself and I'm a 71 year old women!! We bowl a lot with family and friends when they come to visit...........visit? Well we do visit while actively playing games and laughing at the same time and the grandkids never one picked up their cell phones!!! The XBox 360 with sensor has closed the generation gap.
customer_reviews.author: Longshadow

customer_reviews.title: KINECT To Endless Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Kinect Sensor with Kinect Adventures! Very easy to use: just plug in to the newer Slim XBOX 360's or with the Phat XBOX 360's you need the Xbox 360 Kinect AC Adapter/ Power Supply to make it work. Then pop in the DVD that came with the Kinect; Kinect Adventures and start the set-up process. Follow the instruction screens and you will be ready to Kinect to the world in a few minutes! The Kinect works with almost all the new games that are out and with updates you get some limited usage with some of the older games! Either way it is a must and a Plus for your XBOX 360 gaming system!
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Technology!
customer_reviews.text: Great! My 11 y/o daughter loves it. I took out a tape measure first and measured 10 ft. from the center of the sensor with 2 ft. on either side. Then I started moving things around. The sensor itself was placed 4 ft. off the ground above the TV. The user stood 8 ft. from the sensor on center. All calibration worked the first time for me (6'1") and my daughter (4'6"). A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JD3

customer_reviews.title: Fun for multiple players
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, only added 2 wires to my existing cord collection. The interactive elements are intuitive and our 4 year old was able to quickly understand how to use the virtual technology. The bar is very sensitive, improving the gaming experience. Our kids wont play it by themselves, but, 4 friends can easily be tracked in a dance party! We only have a few games and I am hoping that there will be more games available as our kids grow. We have had the unit for about 8 weeks and play has started to taper off-could be that it is nice outside and the swing set is available.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's have really enjoyed the Kinect Sensor
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's have really enjoyed the Kinect Sensor. Dancing, jumping, moving, etc. etc.... Our family has had many wonderful moments playing our Xbox with this sensor. The sensor detects our movements with good precision.
customer_reviews.author: AZ1

customer_reviews.title: Way cool
customer_reviews.text: Kinect is great and will work great for what I want, which is playing a game that both of us can participate in. I've already purchased a couple other games in addition to the the game that comes with it and I'm really loving it. Kinect Adventures river rafting is okay, but the obstacle courses are really good if you want a workout that's also fun. Super easy to get it working. I've got a newer XBox 360 with the built-in wireless adapter, but I doubt that it would be any different experience on an older version. Additional cables and power source were included, which I didn't need. Totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim A.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little discouraged at first but this must've been new because I couldn't tell. Works beautifully. Very nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sandmann

customer_reviews.title: Wow.  Amazing technology and super fun games to boot
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and the kids really enjoy playing it. It's a ton for fun for the whole family. The included Kinect adventures game is a fun start but does get a little repetitive after a while. Another fun game that the kids love is Fruit Ninja available for ~$10 on the Xbox Live arcade. Hours of fun slashing and smashing fruit. My only gripe is I have an old original XBOX and it gets stuck "starting up" the kinect sensor - but entering into a game quickly remedies this problem. Dance Central is on its way and so far the kids love the 2-song demo also available from XBL Arcade.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Some games work well; others don't
customer_reviews.text: As a first version, this kinect system works really fine. I've danced, fought and run in front of it many times, and it's fun. Some games, however, were simply not made to be played with the kinect. I'm not criticizing the playability, but the lags or the low definition lenses sometimes hinder the game performance. Also, it looks pretty fragile, so keep children and pets off! Last, the energy cable cannot be disconnected. It means you need to find a good place to store it. There could be a wireless version of it.
customer_reviews.author: Makoto

customer_reviews.title: The product works really well, kids were still happy.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the Kinect works great. I received it was quite dusty. But I cleaned it so no biggie. The only problem I had was the adventure game said it came with the Kinect and the game was not in the box. So please update the description/features about what comes in the box. So incorrect. You think your paying for something and then don't receive it. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love having the Kinect, unfortunately we purchased this as a birthday gift for 2 of our children, a 4 and 2 year old. We were unaware before buying that there was a height requirement to use the system, and therefore our 2 year old cannot use it. Our 4 year old can play, but it does have some trouble recognizing the smaller kids (our 4 and 5 year old) when they're playing with my husband or myself. But, we still love the system and can Typically play family games together. Overall, a good purchase and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 7

customer_reviews.title: Truely the future!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many cool things you can do with piece of eqipment. I will leave the details to you but the thing i enjoy the most is the speech recodnition. When i say "xbox" it gives me options to operate the xbox without handling anything. I like the versatility that it makes you move around for games and at the same time gives you the ablilty to be lazy. Very balenced. I dont know what my life you be anymore without this piece of equipment. It is the begining of more impressive technologies to come!!
customer_reviews.author: Cartelyous Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great add-on
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best parts of having a Xbox 360. The first games that came out with the Kinect sensor were fun. Then came an overload of bad games. The Kinect sensor is compared to PS3 and Nintendo's sensor is fantastic. Not having to hold a controller while using the Kinnect is amazing. Boith the PS3 and Nintendo products have you holding an additional controller.
customer_reviews.author: SkyPanther and Dogman

customer_reviews.title: Has difficulty recognizing me, but very fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could do zumba at home. It has been awesome. My only complaint is that is never recognizes me or my voice. I do not have a regional/foreign accent, and as a former trainer and ESL instructor/tutor, have been told many times that I am very easy to understand, so, I'm not sure why I'm having these problems. Otherwise, it's great. I get sick of repeating myself, but the fun of the game and zumba makes up for it. I haven't played Kinect Adventures much, but what I did try was fun.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dean

customer_reviews.title: The best thing, I ever did...
customer_reviews.text: The best thing, I ever did for my grandchildren! They are home-schooled and now during their school gym breaks, they get up and moving!
customer_reviews.author: santaclausmama

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: Worked great like expected, easy to hook up, did come in used condition with scratches and stuff but so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Younger Children
customer_reviews.text: I got the Kinect mostly because my young 4 year old was having a hard time using the joystick controls. Now with the Kinect, not only do we have an entire library of games we can try, my little one can participate in the games and not feel left out. The use of his body to play the games is a great way for him to get exercise as well. Now the whole family can enjoy playing the games together and we are all getting a lot of exercise while doing it. It's a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Momof2boyz

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: It works great. My 6 year old daughter played for two hours. Sweaty and tired. Read her movement very well. A few time the kinect would lose her. But that was due too her moving way more the needed. Still trying figure out how it knew it was a girl every time she stepped up to play. Easy to setup. Kinect adventures is a good, but small set of mini games. They work well enough. ( Well daughter played for 2 hours) But you will need more games. There are few good games out. But the potential is not there yet. I'm happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: E. Labelle

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I like it... Issues arise from the sensor and the titles available. Feels like it targets the kiddos more so then the grown ups. The titles that are for older people are not great. The exercise games are great but who wants to work out all the time? It can be a pain to have to resign in just for stepping out of the field of play or being tall and it not pick up on your movements.
customer_reviews.author: Meddersman

customer_reviews.title: Something fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: I'm a more serious gamer usually, but my wife is pretty casual so I bought the Kinect to satisfy my need for HD imagery and new tech and her needs for easy to play games. Besides, it can't hurt me to get off my butt and play a game sometimes. In a lot of ways its like playing the Wii, but its a big upgrade because you don't have to hold onto any controllers or release any buttons at specific times. You literally just stand in front of the thing and it works - its pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: WhiskeyMan

customer_reviews.title: SENSOR WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: THE SENSOR WORKS FLAWLESS. BUT SADLY, THE GAME DOES NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kinetic ,,, love it =)
customer_reviews.text: Wow,, my kinetic become my best friend insted of my brothers friend... the kinetic adventures game is awfull but then I bought the just dance 4 the party has started, We (my family and friends) love it .. Also I lose weght playing with it .. it`s amazing.. after that I am gonna buy a zumba game .. it really improved your xbox 360,, it is better than nintendo and play station 3..
customer_reviews.author: Maskcalavera

customer_reviews.title: So much family fun
customer_reviews.text: This kinect sensor is a great way to get off the couch and have a blast with your friends and family. The sensor tracks every movement you make which makes games more realistic. I've had no problems with mine and I've set it up pretty easily. I love how it automatically signs you in when you walk in front of the screen. Definitely recommend this to you all.
customer_reviews.author: Big time Reviews

customer_reviews.title: A game ahead of it's time
customer_reviews.text: I remember when this came out. Ahhh the good old days
customer_reviews.author: DJ CatsaNova

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The game that comes with it (a kid's game by the way) does not recognize my 5 year old kid. It takes you through the tutorial every time, no matter how many times you've played it. The other games available for this are complete garbage and the hardware does not work nearly as promised. Don't waste your money. It didn't help that the one I bought smelled like the owner smoked 10 packs a day...
customer_reviews.author: Locus

customer_reviews.title: As fun as it sounds
customer_reviews.text: Kinect is a great addition to Xbox as long as you purchase additional games. While Kinect Adventures is fun, it does not use the sensor to it's full potential. We also purchased Dance Central 3 for $39.99 which is a much better game. Kinect is far better than Wii or Play Station's motion tracking (which requires a controller) and is worth the money to purchase. Just try not to play for too long. I played Kinect Adventures for about 5hrs each of the first two days and was quite sore because of it. You don't really notice how tired you are until you stop playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This product pleased me somewhat more than I expected. Depending on the game used you need more or less space or might be limited by standing or sitting. The technology works quite well but if your space or lighting aren't correct the problems are almost impossible to fix. Overall I'm good with it, but some of the games I've tried left me flat. I found, too, there's a fair amount of exercise involved. I think that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Harry F. Drabik

customer_reviews.title: It's a kinect
customer_reviews.text: It's a Kinect, it work and did as a kinect does.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous kinda

customer_reviews.title: Good not Great
customer_reviews.text: Always been fairly finicky but some of the Kinect games are fun
customer_reviews.author: RyanMpwnz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive the Kinect to start my workout games. A busy Mom that works fulltime and goes to school fulltime, its really hard trying to fit the gym in. So I decided to get a Kinect and I would recommend getting it. Not only for work out games but for interaction and spending time with your family, instead of sitting on the couch watching TV, this is way more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walker

customer_reviews.title: great addition to the xbox
customer_reviews.text: I am a casual user of the xbox system and found this product a great addition to my system. It works more or less as advertised. Make sure you have a fairly big room to use it in and enjoy. It brings a new dimension to the games and if you are looking for a twist on your workout, couple this product with a workout game and it is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha G

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have it for your kids
customer_reviews.text: Absolute necessity for the XBox if you buy this for your kids and DON'T want them to become couch potatoes. Gotta get them the appropriate game to make 'em move though. Great innovation, and if used appropriately, will keep the children occupied, moving and having fun. And If you play with your kids too - I assure you, you'll feel the benefit too (particularly if if you play with gusto) lol Robust product - still going strong almost 2 years after purchase and being worked over by a 4 (now 6) year old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband was ecstatic!
customer_reviews.text: He opened up his box of goodies right away and it was in perfect condition. He was able to play with it right away with the user friendly appeal and wound up upsetting our neighbors slightly (we are an upstairs apartment) with his jumping. Definitely think hard before purchasing if you might upset your neighbors!!! My husband is having to work on his light footedness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fast delivery. Works great, just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel BlueFedish

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on a whim to accompany a PC game of mine. I ordered a refurbished one from a third party seller, and was not disappointed. All contents were completely functional, and it even came with an additional PC adapter (which was a component I had purchased from another seller, so now I have two). The Kinect itself isn't a flawless piece of hardware, but it certainly does its job. I've given the 5 star review for the seller, whom I would certainly recommend. (I can't recall the name of the seller in question, so I'll edit it in or leave it in the comments when I stop dancing around my living room long enough to find it.)
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I barely jumped on this bandwagon recently and as for me, Im not much of a kinect person as I prefer a controller for my gaming. My GF and daughter on the other hand love the kinect a play it frequently when time permits. I sit back and watch while I'm on the IPAD lol! Awesome purchase, great deal, and the Kinect came with everything I needed to hook it up to an older gen xbox360!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Wow, enlightening.
customer_reviews.text: this product is a revelation. I think the kids really enjoy the interactive capability of the Kinect and there are many cool games with the Kinect Adventures. I found myself actually wanting to play a game or two while watching them have a great time on Christmas morning. It is great to get a video game unit that actually gets the kids (and adults) up and moving.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: So I just received my kinect on saturday. My fiance opened it and there was no cord for the kinect like it states in the description. Also the game that came with it has fingerprints all over it. Umm I thought this was supposed to be a NEW ONE !! VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wireless system.
customer_reviews.text: There is no doubt that technology used in the design and manufacture of this system this very forward to our time and what have done other companies of consoles, however, sold at a quite affordable price to the public in general. The response of the system depends on each game so you can not judge in general.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Gil A

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THE KINECT!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, something to motivate gamers to get up off our asses? I'm IN! This was a replacement purchase. My old kinect died the very day i bought Dance Central 2, so I had to get a new one immediately. Kinect Adventures is fun, but I already had a copy from my first Kinect purchase. I do wish you could buy the hardware alone for a somewhat lower price, but oh well. It's totally worth it. I'm off to go and DANCE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew he loves it and uses it often
customer_reviews.author: doc holiday

customer_reviews.title: Quality fun
customer_reviews.text: It's fun and encourages us to exercise in play form on the many rainy days in Washington state.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Howe

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We have this thing about 8 feet from the TV and we have no issues with it, sometimes one of our dogs gets infront and messes it up a little so it pauses, but as soon as they get out of the way it starts working again as expected. We're playing more our xBox now than the Wii and there seems to be a good variety of Kinect games available. So nice work Microsoft, I never thought I would actually say that.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Just in time
customer_reviews.text: This kinect works great, no issues. And me and my children are having a blast dancing again....
customer_reviews.author: Yogi Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Hype
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I decided to do the XBOX 360 with Kinect this year. The kids always would compare the wii to the kinect. So we hooked everything up and to be honest, it just wasn't very user friendly. The system itself (xbox 360 w/kinect) was simple and easy but the games and learning how to navigate the kinect was a learning curve. Hoping other games will be a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Kinect is an amazing piece of technology and a great point of difference ...
customer_reviews.text: Kinect is an amazing piece of technology and a great point of difference to consider when considering the various game systems. The kinect has amazing applications outside of gaming. Search the web and check it out!
customer_reviews.author: Chris in DC

customer_reviews.title: I like too know if the Kinect moves or pivets by it self because it it do this one does not it is manual.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and I broke in my Kinect adventures with it and it was fun and Adventurous.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Jonesjr

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, gets boring after a while. The games other than the typical workout games and sports games are pretty limited and repetitive. If you want to use it as a workout tool might be good but I'd rather just save the hundred bucks and go run a few laps. Got this for my wife and she used it like 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: We love Kinect. I had one before but the Ex took it. Kinect is great for adults and children. I have a few work out games by Ea Active that are great. Like having a personal trainer in the house. The just dance games are a riot. We all love to play them. We have also played the sports and adventure games. They are so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Caution!
customer_reviews.text: Product works Great! However, at 65 years of age, this thing can give You an Extrene Workout! Being so much fun it is hard to quit! If You are in need of exercise, from mild to extreme, get one of these and put some effort into it and You will get a great workout! Product works like a charm and also has Video so You can laugh at Yourself, or show others!
customer_reviews.author: CavalierGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully with my Xbox 360S. Came with all cords (including power cord for original Xbox 360) and a perfect sealed copy of Kinect adventures. It was refurbished, but looked brand new and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Poolcoupletx

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is about 8-10" wide. works, Its pretty cool you can browse through menus with your hand. The microphone is cooler. You just yell at it, no moving necessary. Very American. It just seemed to bork my bootup time and cause hangs. It's more of a gadget. I got it for fitness software but it was unimpressive. My beef is not with the form/performance of the unit itself I just found it unnecessary for most people. I put the animal game in once so I can say anything about that fairly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about buying a used electronic (well anywhere really), But I did. It is a great product, exactly as described. I am really glad I took the plunge. Seller did a great job with description. Works great haven't had any problems with it. I would recommend this seller. It also arrived when they said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quick delivery, good product
customer_reviews.text: I received my order within 2 business days, much quicker than expected. The item came in the original box, looks like new. Easy set up, came with all cables. the only issue is that the enclosed game "Kinect Adventures" does not appear to be working so I am awaiting response to exchange the game. We have other games that work just fine so we know it is not the gaming system. I would definitely purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J

customer_reviews.title: Bad condition
customer_reviews.text: The game part of this package was completely scratched and not working . The seller should really test the games before saying they are in good working condition. Bummer for the whole family as we were looking forward to playing the game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for exercising
customer_reviews.text: My Grandchildren stayed the summer & quickly became addicted to my XBOX. I decided they needed to move so I bought the kinect & the laughter began! They were moving & Papa & I watched & laughed with them. Now that they are gone I will be using the Kinect for excersize.
customer_reviews.author: K. Laverty

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be lower in price
customer_reviews.text: Good used product, price needs to be lower by about $10.00 though
customer_reviews.author: Kelley K

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: While visiting son he asked if I would like to have an Xbox because he received it as apromotional gift from his cable company...of course I would. I ordered the Kinect sensor to have a complete gaming system. I enjoyed watching my daughter and her family playing with their and now we can play together. Thank you son!!!
customer_reviews.author: msladydc

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping and it was much better than I expected. My boy was training to be a Jedi fighter within 5 minutes of opening the box. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it but having issues with space. Thought I had enough but it's barely getting by. Hoping the zoom helps, when it gets here! I'm awestruck by the accuracy at which this can track my movements, even in my limited area. Impressive technology. I'm having a lot of fun exercising with it.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Just like a new one
customer_reviews.text: Game early and is perfect! Works great and my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: It actually exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Since this product was not brand new I did not have high hopes, but after seeing it and installing it, it operated and appeared like it just came off the shelve so I would recommend purchases from this company. I have found them to be honest and shipped the product quickly. So yes I give this company 5 out of 5 stars across the board. If your debating on making a purchase from them go ahead you will not be disappointed. I usually do not take the time to do this however, this time I was so happy with my experience I had to take the time.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Cotner

customer_reviews.title: Great product, like new
customer_reviews.text: I received my item before promise date. Seller went the extra mile and sent a thank you card. The kinect sensor looked new, works great. My girls love it. Thank you this was a great buy
customer_reviews.author: kristy moran

customer_reviews.title: so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It only works with select games. It is so easy to use. I just got up off the sofa and was immediately in the game. I am the mom not a video game player at all until now. I love it and if i can do it anyone can.
customer_reviews.author: catmom

customer_reviews.title: Voice commands are great, games that use it are even better
customer_reviews.text: Must own for Xbox. Voice commands are great, games that use it are even better.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this through Amazon Warehouse and was not disappointed. The quality of the item was new and worked perfectly out of the box. My daughter has enjoyed playing some games such as the Sesame Street and Dance Party. The setup is pretty easy and it seems that the sensor is pretty responsive. Overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: JJMel

customer_reviews.title: Good price but Doesn't Work as well as you would hope.
customer_reviews.text: Like always, Amazon has the best price on the Kinect Sensor. However, we found the Kinect to be very intermittent in its ability to properly sense the people's movement during game play. Some games work pretty good, other games are useless. You need a fairly large (deep) living room and the light conditions have to be perfect. We found the Kinect to be more frustrating than fun. For just a little more, get a Wii system which works a whole lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Kinect Plus Adventures Game Is Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe we didn't purchase Kinect sooner (being owners of an X BOX 360 already)! My 7 year old twin girls LOVE playing Adventures on Kinect. Kinect & games provide AWESOME exercise, easy for them to learn and play, and the entire family gets hours of enjoyment out of Kinect Adventures on the weekend! You can't beat Kinect Adventures for the buck, and I'd highly recommend purchasing Kinect for anyone who already owns the XBOX 360. Very easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Kinect is great!
customer_reviews.text: The XBox Kinect is a wonderful advancement in video game technology. I was interested in the Fitness program as well as my son. The program and the Adventure games that came with the Kinect are good. The Fitness program gives feedback when you are not following the movements exactly, and it helps you to maximize your exercise program. Haven't been through the entire program yet, but there is variety with the Personal Trainer, Gym games and Fitness games. The Kinect is great! Wonderful not to have to hold a controller. It's amazing how the sensor can detect each of your movements. Would highly recommend the Kinect. Don't know anything about other games yet.
customer_reviews.author: tarheelmom

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for my son's Xbox 360. Not really interested in spending $500 on Xbox one anytime soon. Both my son and daughter really enjoy the games and dancing for this. Way better than making them do push ups :) They'll go down stairs for hours and get a pretty good workout having fun.
customer_reviews.author: John Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: needs lots of light
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have a lot of light, either ambient or directed onto the person in front of the kinect sensor, it has a much harder time of identifying motion correctly. That is a potential downside as compared to the Wii in which you have controller in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Guy M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Kinect Works Great And Adventures Is Good Too
customer_reviews.text: The next step in motion gaming is here, and it's Kinect. A definite step forward from the move and Wii. Adventures works great, the game is highly responsive and all the horror stories of game-breaking lag are nowhere to be seen. The hardware picks up your movement extremely well, and adventures has some nice simple family games. If you want to get you/your kids off the couch and have some fun playing video games you can't go wrong with this. I rate this package 5/5 I did get a game (Motionsports) with it that I do not give a good rating to. However, Adventures performs extremely well and is a lot of fun. It's a good family title.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Tweed

customer_reviews.title: ... a Christmas gift but we got if for a great price and got 2 games which was unexpected so ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephews it came right on time we haven't played yet since it's a Christmas gift but we got if for a great price and got 2 games which was unexpected so was very pleased! I'm sure it will play just fine since it's all new packaging and brand new game.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Are you watching me?
customer_reviews.text: It just now occured to me that kiddo leaves the xbox and kinect ON and just turns the tv off. Sooooooo, does that mean people can watch me walk by to the kitchen in the middle of the night in my underwear???? Suddenly this doesn't seem like such a good idea!
customer_reviews.author: Adryenn Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wow super fast shipping, and was exactly as described. No issues with anything, smoothest experience I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I purchased this for my nephew
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased this for my nephew. Now they can dance, jump, basically play all the active games as they wish. The sensor made us confused a bit at first, but as we got used to it, it was very easy to control. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Uyen Vu

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my teens for getting good grades this year. They love to play it. Instead of twiddling with their thumbs, they are up singing and dancing. It is hilarious at times. It captures the motion and integrates with the games very well.
customer_reviews.author: jsansa

customer_reviews.title: bought this for my 30yr old son
customer_reviews.text: I have adult sons. We are very competitive with each other. My oldest son was the only one that didn't have a Kinect. He loves it and we play against each other at least 2 times a week. He lives over 100 miles from me. This is a great way to keep in touch and polish the competitive spirit :)
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this
customer_reviews.text: We have been playing with this now for about 2 years. My kids love the games for it. The sensor is better than I expected. I developed games for a living for about 5 years. There are some pretty crappy games for this, but most of them seem pretty good. If you have kids I think this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisH

customer_reviews.title: Epic awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I hate to sound like a video game nerd - I really am not- but, this is so much fun! It was very easy to set up and is incredibly entertaining to play. The Kinect does get confused if you move too much during non-game playing segments and has to be recalibrated. Would definitely recommend it to anyone who has an XBox 360. It does take a lot of room - I have to move my couch to play games.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Vast potential
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the future. Unfortunately the software for it is still stuck in the present. It also hooks up to my PC allowing me to test it out in a variety of ways. Its very responsive and intelligent. Once the software companies find the right formula to go with it...it will be ground breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kilduff

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Some features are excellent other features are not the best, the accuracy reading movements is not bad but is not excellent, perfect for watch movies and use the voice commands, the kids gonna love it teens not too much...
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Valverde

customer_reviews.title: Get a Kinect!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I bothered to have an Xbox without Kinect. I never used it. Now I use it all the time. I don't feel silly using it. It's actually a lot of fun, and a great activity in the evening when I don't feel like leaving the house, but I want to do something active, rather than watch TV.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: ton of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so precise and its fun with a group of people. The set up is so easy...just plug and play. It's addicting and people that don't play video games will often be one saying they got next. It's refreshing and cool..makes a great gift too for those that have no idea what it is.
customer_reviews.author: D. Woods

customer_reviews.title: kids screaming with delight
customer_reviews.text: Wow we had a Wii but my 12 yr old was whooping and hollering playing with the Kinect. Don't even know what he was playing but he was having a huge time. I held back one star as we've only had this for a couple days. May edit later to speak to durability, and longer term evaluation.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie W. Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Kinect is amazing
customer_reviews.text: We spent 3 hours last night as family; my 5yr old loved Kinectimals game, my wife and I played Dance Central and Adventures games. Control accuracy, speed and ease of use all exceeded our expectations. I recommend Kinect to everyone, all ages. For example, my 5yr old doesn't really like or able to expertly use the standard Xbox controller, or Dance Dance Revolution pad due to usability issues. Kinect enabled a whole new chapter for her; it took her 30 seconds to learn had a lot of fun. Most importantly, she wasn't sitting in a couch -- rather jumping up and down all over the living room :)
customer_reviews.author: Magician

customer_reviews.title: bought this kinect to hack
customer_reviews.text: I don't have an xbox 360, but I wanted to get the sensor so I would be able to hack it and play around with it. This is the version of the kinect sensor that you want since it comes with the usb cord that allows you to connect the sensor to your computer. Other newer versions of the sensor require that you buy the usb cable separately.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Good clean fun.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Kinect! The Adventures game it comes with is pretty fun, but gets old pretty quick. Sometimes I do the raft game with my 3 year old, and she loves it too. Glitches happen from time to time, but overall a great system.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

product_meta.title: Kinect Sensor with Kinect Adventures!
product_meta.description:
Kinect for Xbox 360 brings games and entertainment to life in extraordinary new ways with no controller required. Simply step in front of the sensor and Kinect recognizes you and responds to your gestures. Connecting in a whole new way is as easy as a wave of your hand. Kinect removes the last barrier between you and the experiences you love. Best of all, Kinect works with every Xbox 360 console.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Product Description
Kinect brings games and entertainment to life in extraordinary newways – no controller required. Easy to use and instantly fun, Kinect gets everyone off the couch moving, laughing and cheering. See a ball? Kickit. Control an HD movie with a wave of the hand. Want to join a friend in the fun? Simply jump in. With Kinect technology evaporates, letting the natural magic in all of us shine. And the best part is Kinect works with every Xbox 360 right out of the box*.

What's in The Box?

 * Kinect Sensor
 * Power Supply Cable
 * Kinect Adventures Game
 * Manual

Product Features

 * Array of 4 microphones supporting single speaker voice recognition
 * Depth Camera 640x480 pixel resolution @30FPS
 * Color VGA Motion Camera 640x480 pixel resolution @30FPS
 * Fully compatible with all Xbox 360 models*
 * Revolutionary technology that includes body recognition

About Kinect Adventures Game (Included in the box)
Publisher: Microsoft Game Studios
Developer: Good Science Studio
Format: DVD compatible with Kinect for the Xbox 360 video game and entertainment system
ESRB Rating: “E” for Everyone


Developer Information: Good Science Studio, formerly code-named “Spawnpoint,” is a Microsoft Game Studio game development studio founded in 2009 by a combination of industry veterans and creative newcomers. “Kinect Adventures” is the first title from Good Science. Float in outer space. Experience the thrill of roaring rapids. Tackle mountain top obstacle courses. And dive into the deep to explore a leaky underwater observatory — all from your living room. With “Kinect Adventures,” you are the controller as you jump, dodge and kick your way through exciting adventures set in a variety of exotic locations.

What else you need to play Kinect:

 * Xbox 360 4GB Console
 * Room to Play (6ft between you and the sensor)*
 * You!

* Xbox LIVE Gold membership required for online multiplayer and Video Kinect. 190 MB of storage required; subject to change with system updates. Play space will vary with sensor placement and other factors.
feature_bullets: Easily hook up with friends with Video Kinect, no headset required.
Sign into your profile by just stepping in front of the sensor
Kinect games give you the freedom to jump, duck, and spin your way through a unique adventure.
Kinect uses cutting-edge technology to provide a whole new way to play
